bug.author: myungjoo
bug.summary: [Filter/tensorflow-lite] AllocateTensors appears to be called too many time.

comments.comment: : Thank you for posting issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/557>#557</denchmark-link> . The person in charge will reply soon.

the awkward code was updated at the new version already :) <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnsuite/nnstreamer/blob/057d0ee0e658ddc4289d1c8656494201d0ebfa0c/gst/tensor_filter/tensor_filter_tensorflow_lite_core.cc#L292-L304>https://github.com/nnsuite/nnstreamer/blob/057d0ee0e658ddc4289d1c8656494201d0ebfa0c/gst/tensor_filter/tensor_filter_tensorflow_lite_core.cc#L292-L304</denchmark-link>
